name: COVID19SNOMEDValueSetForUnspecifiedHeartFailure
title: COVID19 SNOMED Value Set for Unspecified Heart Failure
purpose: (Clinical Focus: This set of values contains terms related to unspecified heart failure (chronicity unspecified).),(Data Element Scope: ),(Inclusion Criteria: Includes unspecified heart failure (chronicity unspecified). It includes systolic/diastolic heart failure, heart failure with reduced/preserved ejection fraction, and both left- and right-sided heart failure. It also includes heart failure diagnoses secon),(Exclusion Criteria: Excludes acute, chronic, acute on chronic, postprocedural, fetal, neonatal, and obstetric related heart failure. It also excludes heart failure staging terms (e.g., Congestive heart failure stage B).)
